entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 10:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -21.1°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
